name: tikz
title: TikZ
description: Convert TikZ code to an image, to be shown in AI chat
author: Visual-Studio-Coder

tools.name: generate-tikz-diagram
tools.title: Generate TikZ Diagram.
tools.description: Pass in code for a TikZ diagram and then display it using the markdown format within AI chat! When you receive the file path, the way to present it in markdown is to use the following format: ![Diagram](file://<file_path>) (make sure to encode the file path)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
